ComicInfo.Summary:
A clash of both swords and ideals meet head on as Aldaran is forced to fully commit himself to the task of toppling the empire as the carefully laid plans Aldaran originally hatched to free Kameko from the clutches of the emperor disintegrate into near open-warfare in the surrounding countryside of the Imperial City. This time however, with one of Shidima's most infamous swordsmen standing in his way, its Aldaran who has to worry about surviving the encounter.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-20 22:52:02. [Issue ID 115127]
